description:
MyBlogU is the free blogger collaboration platform. This Udemy course explains the platform feature set and the best ways to utilize them.

Take the course:

  • If you are looking for ways to promote your blog
  • If you are wondering how to build your own community
  • If you want to build traffic and audience
  • If you are interested in building your personal brand and positioning yourself as an industry thought leader
  • If you are looking for content inspiration
  • If you are interested in partnering or building mutually beneficial business relationships

This course is the ultimate resource of MyBlogU video tutorials and official guides.
title: Content marketing & influence building w/ MyBlogU
